LOKESH REDDY GANGASANI 
  +1(650)417-3743 |Email |San Jose, California 
 
EDUCATION 
 
Master of Science, Software Engineering, San Jose State University Aug 2022 - Jun 2024 
Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science and Engineering, VNR VJIET Jul 2017 - May 2021 
 
SKILLS
 
● Programming and Scripting Languages: Python, R, C, C++, Java, JavaScript, HTML, SQL, TypeScript 
● Amazon Web Services (AWS): EC2, S3 
● AI and Data Science: NumPy, Scikit-learn, Pandas, Pytorch, TensorFlow, Keras , Matplotlib, Data Mining,,LLMs, GANs 
● Tools & Technologies: Hadoop, php, Node.js, React.js, REST APIs, Tableau, SaS, GraphQL, MATLAB, Git 
● Software Engineering: Requirement Analysis, Agile and Scrum, Source Code Management, Enterprise 
Architecture, JIRA, IBM DOORS, IBM RTC, Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC), CI/CD,design 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
 Software Engineer, Maverick Innogarage LLC Aug 2024 - Present

Architecture, JIRA, IBM DOORS, IBM RTC, Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC), CI/CD,design 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
 Software Engineer, Maverick Innogarage LLC Aug 2024 - Present 
❖ Built an application to extract text from 10,000 files of various formats such as docx, doc, pdf, xls,xlsx 
❖ Performed topic modeling on text and separated files into 10 topics by utilizing LDA 
❖ Summarized text obtained from 10,000 files utilizing BERT Summarizer 
Systems Engineer, Tata Consultancy Services, Hyderabad, India                                             Oct 2021 - Aug 2022 
❖  Designed and deployed an answering bot for the Repost website. This bot leverages state-of-the-art technology, 
utilizing a Large Language Model (LLM) powered by generative AI to provide real-time responses to user 
questions upon posting 
❖ Handled a peak of 1000 concurrent users, showcasing bot's scalability and performance capabilities

questions upon posting 
❖ Handled a peak of 1000 concurrent users, showcasing bot's scalability and performance capabilities 
❖ This answering bot was able to answer 20% of total questions which were not answered and reduced user wait 
time by 90%.This resulted in an impressive increase in user engagement and satisfaction 
Software Engineer, Acalvio, Hyderabad, India May 2021 - Oct  2021 
❖ Built a Python and C++ farmer chatbot on Linux, leveraging LSTM models to process 10,000+ intents with 92% 
accuracy, integrating real-time APIs over IP networks. 
❖ Optimized backend performance, reducing response time by 40% for 5,000+ users in a distributed setup. 
❖ Automated API interactions with Perl scripts, increasing user engagement by 35% via a Java-based React Native 
app interface. 
 
PROJECT EXPERIENCE 
 
 
Image-Based Fashion Recommendation, SJSU  Mar 2023 - May 2023 
❖ Created a recommendation system suggesting visually similar products and outfits based on a base product 
image

Image-Based Fashion Recommendation, SJSU  Mar 2023 - May 2023 
❖ Created a recommendation system suggesting visually similar products and outfits based on a base product 
image 
❖ The system was trained on 80k images and employed ResNet-50 transfer learning and Spotify's ANNOY for 
recommending fashion products 
 
Vision Based Human Activity Recognition, SJSU  Mar 2023 - May 2023 
❖ Developed a prototype using CNN and transfer learning to recognize human activities. Tested on real-time video 
data. 
❖ Compared classification performance, using different CNN models: VGG-16, VGG-19, and Inception-v3. VGG- 16 
performed best with classification accuracy of 96.95% 
Sentiment Analysis and Rating Prediction, SJSU  Mar 2023 - May 2023 
❖ Developed a prototype using CNN and transfer learning to recognize human activities. Tested on real-time video 
data. 
❖ Compared classification performance, using different CNN models: VGG-16, VGG-19, and Inception-v3. VGG- 16

data. 
❖ Compared classification performance, using different CNN models: VGG-16, VGG-19, and Inception-v3. VGG- 16 
performed best with classification accuracy of 96.95%
